title: 🎯 How to Use This Slideshow Creator
author: Interactive Tutorial
description: Learn how to create, edit, and present amazing slideshows with this powerful tool

data.title: What You're Watching
data.content: This presentation is running in AUTO-PLAY mode to demonstrate the slideshow features. You can take control anytime!
bullets: ⏸️ Click 'Auto Play' button to pause automatic progression
◀️ Use 'Prev' and 'Next' buttons to navigate manually
⌨️ Press arrow keys (←/→) for keyboard navigation
🚪 Click 'Exit' to return to the editor
⌨️ Press ESC key to exit presentation mode

data.title: 🎨 Creating Your First Slide
data.content: The editor on the left provides multiple slide types for different content needs.
bullets: 📝 Title Slides - Perfect for introductions and section headers
📄 Text Slides - Main content with bullet points support
🖼️ Image Slides - Visual content with captions
❓ Question Slides - Interactive multiple choice questions
💻 Code Slides - Syntax-highlighted code examples

data.caption: The slide editor provides an intuitive interface for creating professional presentations

data.title: 🔧 Editing Slides
data.content: Once you exit this presentation, you'll be able to edit and create slides in the main interface.
bullets: ➕ Click any 'Add [Type] Slide' button to create new slides
✏️ Click 'Edit' button on existing slides to modify them
📁 Click 'Duplicate' to copy a slide
🗑️ Click 'Delete' to remove unwanted slides
⬆️⬇️ Use 'Move Up/Down' to reorder slides

data.question: Which button would you click to create a slide with bullet points?
data.answer: Add Text Slide is perfect for content with bullet points, paragraphs, and structured text content.

data.title: 🎬 Presentation Mode
data.content: Transform your slides into a full-screen presentation experience.
bullets: ▶️ Click 'Start Presentation' to enter full-screen mode
🔄 Toggle 'Auto Play' for hands-free presentation
⏱️ Auto-play advances slides every 8 seconds
👥 Perfect for demonstrations and self-running displays
📱 Works great on all screen sizes

data.title: 💾 Saving Your Work
data.content: Never lose your presentation with the built-in save and load functionality.
bullets: 💾 'Save Presentation' stores your work in browser storage
📂 'Load Presentation' retrieves your saved work
🔄 Your work auto-saves as you make changes
📋 'Clear All' removes all slides to start fresh
⚠️ Remember: Data is saved locally in your browser

data.title: 📚 Sample Presentations
data.content: Explore the dropdown menu at the top to load pre-made presentations for inspiration.
bullets: 🎓 AI & Machine Learning - Tech education content
🌱 Sustainable Living - Environmental awareness
📸 Photography Basics - Creative skills tutorial
⚡ Productivity Hacks - Efficiency tips and tricks
💡 Each sample shows different slide types and techniques

data.caption: Code slides support syntax highlighting for multiple programming languages

data.title: 🚀 Ready to Start Creating?
data.content: You now know all the basics! Here's what to do next:
bullets: 🚪 Exit this presentation (click Exit or press ESC)
🗑️ Clear the current slides to start fresh
➕ Add your first slide using the control buttons
✍️ Write your content and see it update in real-time
🎬 Start your presentation when you're ready to share!
